quote: What matters most, is not how my end happens, or if it happens now. What I care about in this instant, is that she knows how much I love herâ€”that I lived long enough to have her love me back.
quote_letters: WHAT MATTERS MOST IS NOT HOW MY END HAPPENS OR IF IT HAPPENS NOW WHAT I CARE ABOUT IN THIS INSTANT IS THAT SHE KNOWS HOW MUCH I LOVE HER-THAT I LIVED LONG ENOUGH TO HAVE HER LOVE ME BACK
